name: Dark Matter Run
description:
This game was developed as part of an educational project. The goal of the project was to promote accessibility to video games and game development for underprivileged individuals and communities. A component of the project involved the development a game that was small in size and would run smoothly on sub-$300, off-the-shelf laptops. 

How you can help
I would greatly appreciate it if you could help out my research by filling out a Google Forms survey here: https://forms.gle/3RD3S3LY5b1Fjhy2
